name: Relytech Services
overview: Established in 1998, Kontech Computer Services have been helping small and mid-size business, nonprofit organizations and home users computer users establish and maintain their computer systems and provide them with a quality service and support at an affordable price. Kontech delivers comprehensive, powerful and cost-effective IT solutions and IT consulting experience in support of customersâ€™ needs and business objectives. We provide computer repair and computer services for office and home equipment, network cabling installations and more. We work one on one with you to ensure your complete satisfaction and take the time to get to know you and your business computing needs better. In addition to PC computer repair, network support and structured wiring Kontech provides IT consulting services for small and mid-size businesses. Whether you run a body shop, a gift store or a real estate office, there’s a certain level of technical expertise required for IT systems to run smoothly, efficiently and cost-effectively.
